Hi everyone,

We are currently looking for reviewers for an upcoming book f=
ocused on Java
testing.

The book will cover a lot of different aspects of =
testing, among which:

   - Unit, system, functional, etc...
   - Performan=
ce
   - Data-driven
   - Multi-thread
   - Enterprise (JNDI, JDBC, EJB3, JT=
A, JAX-WS, JMS, etc...)
   - Web
   - Spring
   - Mocking
   - Coverage
   =
- Dependency injection
   - Graphical
   - etc...

Please drop me an email =
(don't forget to remove the mailing-list from the
CC's) if you're intereste=
d in reviewing it, or even just chapters.  Please
also include your motivat=
ion for reviewing this book in a few lines.

Thanks!
-- 
C=E9dric
